info.description:

get.description: Used to retrieve all records in a specific App. The Fields and records included in the response object depend on the access settings of the authenticated user.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The Field which is used to sort the retrieved records. The value should contain the Field Id. When left empty, the Key Field is used to sort the records.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sort direction. Accepts asc or desc. Default value: asc.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: By specifying an offset, you retrieve a subset of objects starting with the offset value. The 10th record is at offset 9. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many records should be retrieved. Accepts any value between 0 and 200. Default value: 200.
